testcaseName: Dose #1 of Covid 19 vaccine given as Pfizer, Dose #2 as Janssen

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)
administeredDoses.evaluationReason: Not a preferable or allowable vaccine

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)
doses.evaluationReason: Not a preferable or allowable vaccine

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient has been administered the first dose of the Covid-19 vaccine as Pfizer and a second dose administered at 4 weeks later, as Janssen, that the Pfizer dose is considered to be invalid, and the Janssen dose is to be considered valid.  Another dose should be forecasted.
reasonForChange: v4.13 - Updated test case to include ACIP recommendation where if the first dose of a Covid-19 vaccine is an MRNA followed with a second dose of Janssen, that another dose should be forecast.
